name: Duo's Game
description:
Looks like you forgot your Spanish lesson today. You know what happens now!

Since you missed your Duolingo lesson, Duo wanted to teach you a lesson by having 

you look through the phones of his victims. One will help you escape, the other will

 be certain death. 

Just so you know, I am aware that there is a Duolingo game called "push", which can be found on Gamejolt.

Oh, hey Markiplier. Why don't you check out this game that my friend @RenderPi made? https://renderpi.itch.io/markiplier-nightmare

Here are some awesome install instructions since the others aren't specific for beginners:

Download the file.

Right click it, and click extract all.

Click on Duo's Game. 

The game should open up.

I'll try to respond to as many comments as I can, and I appreciate all the support for

 this game. 

This is my first game, and I hope to make many more.
